mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contentsgood(contentsgoodno, rdate, contentsno, memberno) VALUES (contentsgood_seq.nextval, sysdate, #{contentsno}, #{memberno})
mapper.select: SELECT contentsgoodno, rdate, contentsno, memberno FROM contentsgood ORDER BY contentsgoodno DESC

SELECT r.contentsgoodno, r.rdate, r.contentsno, c.title as c_title, r.memberno, m.id, m.mname FROM contents c, contentsgood r, member m WHERE c.contentsno = r.contentsno AND r.memberno = m.memberno ORDER BY contentsgoodno DESC
